column2: Counsel  for  the  Appellant  submitted  that  the  learned  Trial  Judge  has  failed
to  give  attention  to  the  fact  that  none  of the  eye  witnesses  directly  testifies
that  the  Appellant  assaulted  the  deceased.  It  is  further  submitted  that  the

in  convicting  the  Appellant 
in 
the  absence  of 
learned  Trial  Judge  erred
In  case of Sarath Kumara  V.  Attorney General  CA  20512008  [04 .04.2014]
